snippet.title: Play TOSS!🍌 DEMO now, Feb 3rd - 9th - VR on Steam Game Festival 2021 - teaser trailer
snippet.description:
Download on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1270460/TOSS/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=post&utm_content=steam_festival_demo_teaser

Play TOSS!🍌 DEMO, available until February 9th on Steam Game Festival

TOSS!🍌 is a bananas VR climbing platformer where you play as an acrobatic ape with the strength to swing and toss yourself freely between obstacles in challenging playgrounds. 🐒

A preview demo of TOSS!🍌 is now available on the Steam Winter Game Festival VR. The demo is available until the end of the festival, February 9th so there’s no time to waste. What are you waiting for? Go play right now! 

And please come tell us what you think in our Discord community. We wanna hear it all!

Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1270460/TOSS/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=post&utm_content=steam_festival_demo_teaser
Agera Games Discord community https://discord.gg/MwnsNGz​
Twitter https://twitter.com/TossVR
Presskit https://tossvr.com/press​
Monetization permission https://tossvr.com/press#monetization

About the developers
Agera Games is a small indie developer working on their first Virtual Reality Game TOSS!🍌 
The game is aiming to release on Oculus Quest and Steam in Spring 2021. Support us by Wishlisting TOSS!🍌 on Steam or subscribing to our newsletter on https://www.tossvr.com.
